Html:
I'm having a problem. Only one PNG appears.

The map is compossed by various PNG files downloaded from the server but I can only see the top-left one, and the rest of the map is blank.

No errors appear, if I try to scroll the map, the first PNG is theare until I move enough so another PNG is needed to fill the top-left position, then I only see that new PNG and nothing else.

Any help is appreciated.
does the demos works perfect, yes, so the problem is in your app ;}

Yeah I know that, but i'm stack and can't find out how to solve that.

Do you have a simpler version, without the controls in the right. just one with a map?

Because I'm trying to figure out how this works but I'm getting lost inside all the code.
controls doesn't affect map ;} all you need to set is min/max/current zoom, provider and position
